overview: Steve Manning is the Chief Executive Officer for ReCellular, Inc. Steve previously worked at Solectron as senior vice president of strategy, marketing and business development, gaining extensive finance, sales and executive management experience. He joined Solectron through the acquisition of Sequel Inc. A founder of the company, he began as vice president of Sales and Marketing in 1990 and then served as chief executive officer until 1999. In his role as vice president of Sales and Marketing, Steve was responsible for all marketing, account management, program management and customer service functions. As CEO, Steveâ€™s responsibilities included management of the companyâ€™s operational and financial activities.
